function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation in built environment","Impact":"Could lead to outbreaks and public health crisis","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation measures, promote vaccination, and enforce social distancing","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, vaccination technology, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, building occupants, healthcare workers","Owner":"Health departments, building management, government"}]}
